Date: Monday, 9/1/1976
Subject: Progress of Ken Oberkfell
Dear Sir,
Ken Oberkfell is hitting the ball well at AA Pittsfield Rangers!
He has an AVG of .280, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 9/3/1976
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Dwight Siebler
